title: HOUR 2 - NBA, Lakers, Cowboys

description:
Could Kyrie Irving be traded to the Lakers?

Update on Aaron Donald and the Los Angeles Rams

The Cowboys did not have a good offseason

What will the Pelicans do with Zion Williamson?

 

Guest: Bill Oram
